Name: Death Goat
About the game: Death Goat is a bloody arcade shooter featuring hordes of brutal enemies & eardrum destroying Heavy Metal. Zone out, sharpen your arcade twitch skills and decimate demons to a metal soundtrack featuring killer songs from: Between The Buried And Me Byzantine Holy Grail God Forbid Bloodshot Dawn I Legion Tyrant of Death The Raven Autarchy Dethlehem Warforged Konkeror Lorelei Vanisher Immortal Guardian Aegaeon Brutai Kardashev Dawn Of Leviathan Extinction Level Event Mare Cognitum NYN
Meta Title: Death Goat: Jun 7, 2016, Terminal Press and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Death Goat? Check out the release date (Jun 7, 2016), developer insights from Terminal Press, and a complete game summary.
